info.task: navigate forwards to filled in collapsed combobox
info.title: Navigate forwards to a filled in, collapsed combobox in interaction mode

setupScript.name: moveFocusBeforeComboboxAndSetValueToAlabama
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link before the Combobox, and sets the combobox value to 'Alabama'

user: Navigate to the Combobox. Note: it should be in the collapsed state.
instructions.raw: Navigate to the Combobox. Note: it should be in the collapsed state.
instructions.mode: Verify the PC Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn off the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.

assertions.expectation: Name of the combobox ('State') is conveyed
State of the combobox (collapsed) is conveyed
Text of the selected option ('Alabama') is conveyed
The ability to enter or edit text is conveyed
State of the text in the input (selected) is conveyed
The presence of autocomplete behavior is conveyed
